name: Country Adventure
description:
Adventure and survival game that takes place in an open world RPG style, where you will start as a small farmer and you can even overcome dungeons full of enemies, decorate houses you buy or build, buy vehicles, fish, hunt, trade, raise animals and much more.

Features


Farming
  • Breeding animals
  • Create your own farm fields
Trading
  • Buy vehicles
  • Seeds to impruve the farm
Construction
  • Create your home
  • Improve your live style
  • Create and sell items
Fighting
  • Defeat monsters
  • Take all the loot
